website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option for wall-mount TVs and other areas with limited space. Fairly easy to install; it's premounted to the housing.
pros: Installation is simple, and electrical box fits perfectly into standard-size boxes
cons: Receptacle screws aren't grounded, so installers must be sure to ground unit properly
Some users feel it doesn’t sit deep enough
Only one flat-type plug fits within the recess

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for tight spaces - power window shades, in-wall television
customer_reviews.text: Others have commented these takes up space within the box and it's true - I've attached a photo comparing this to a standard Leviton receptacle and 22 cubic inch box. I've found a pair of 12/2 fits just fine but I wouldn't recommend more than two cables per box. Trim is integrated, wallboard needs to go on before final attachment of this outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed in our bedroom. We use an outlet behind our bed and the frame was constantly unplugging our power strips. This fixed that AND fit into a very old and cramped receptacle box. I didn’t have to replace it! Super easy! I honestly want to replace all the receptacles in my house with these! I hope this lasts longer than other Leviton products I have used. All of the other standard outlets in my house were replaced 3 years ago and most are already too loose to hold a plug in place, and that’s with minimal use. My wife’s Wallflowers fall out all the time. I’ll update this review if I notice this thing wearing out prematurely!
customer_reviews.author: Geof Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for flush applications; don't forget to connect the GND wire
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the solution that this receptacle brought to me. It fits perfectly well in any metallic box behind the drywall and allows for a recessed space for flush mounting of media equipment and TV power cords. Very satisfied with the product. Please note very important: the receptacle screws are not grounded, so if you are in a modern installation where metallic boxes are usually grounded and any receptacle screwed into them would automatically also be grounded, this one does not come with grounded screws so you must connect the third GND wire.
customer_reviews.author: Solar_Ize

customer_reviews.title: Nearly same as the Cooper product
customer_reviews.text: Nearly identical to the Cooper recessed outlet But this one has 3mm smaller bezel (in height and width) and has a more matte finish. Identical depths (recessed plug and back of the outlet). The Cooper product is tamper resistant, if that matters to you. I liked the appearance of this one more but aside from the TR feature of the Cooper (which was also 1 dollar less at the time of purchase) they are pretty much the same. Remember to attach a dedicated ground wire--neither product has the metal "ears" for automatic grounding to a metal box.
customer_reviews.author: david in nyc

customer_reviews.title: Great for flush mounted TV.
customer_reviews.text: It functions, and fit in my normal (fairly shallow) electric box. I wanted to mount a TV in a location where I already had an electric outlet. For some inexplicable reason, the previous owners had installed this particular electric outlet at nipple height... Lucky for me, it was a great spot to mount a TV, which would utilize this odd placed outlet and cover the weird outlet perfectly. I chose the most shallow TV mount I could find (why would anyone choose a mount that jutts out more than it absolutely has to?). The flush mount would give too little clearance for the tv's power cord... Well not with this baby. 5 minutes of work and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for current to-code boxes - older standard outlet boxes may not provide enough room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was the thinnest 1+" recessed outlet I could find, and it works well. My home is an old build, however, and the outlet box in question (standard in American builds in the 1950s-70s) was too small to fit it. Luckily I already had another larger outlet box on-hand (sized at the current standard), and with a little trim to my drywall to install it, this went in subsequently without issue. Now my dresser can push flat against the bottom trim on my wall, which is everything I needed from this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

customer_reviews.title: Helps get furniture closer to the wall
customer_reviews.text: I installed this behind a chest of drawers in the master bedroom of my house. If you have changed outlets or light switches before, this is a pretty easy install...except that the depth of your outlet box can make it difficult to get this flush with the wall. If possible, I would recommend making sure you have a deep box to put this in. Value for the cost is good, though. Overall, if you have some experience with minor electrical work, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great for close mount flat-screens
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these that I've purchased for mounting a flat screen tv on the wall. I originally had installed a regular outlet that would be covered once the television was installed. Unfortunately due to the power plug of the TV protruding, it didn't work...that's when I got one of these badboys. It allows for the plugs to sit recessed a little into the wall for a nice flush mount. Other than that, they aren't exciting. It's a power plug...no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: I Review

customer_reviews.title: New Fan of Recessed Outlets
customer_reviews.text: I am a new fan of these recessed electrical outlets. This is was 2nd one I have purchased. This one was to replace outlet over mantel on fireplace. These are perfect when you don't want the plug protruding out and taking up room. Easy to install and looks nice. Just wish they offered in more colors for those places to blend it in so it is not so noticeable also need to make with GFCI. Looking for more places to use these.
customer_reviews.author: CWood

customer_reviews.title: Recessed outlet
customer_reviews.text: We have an old dry sink and wanted to plug in a corner doorway fan behind it. Unfortunately it made the dry sink stick out an extra inch or two. I looked up recessed plugs on Amazon and discovered this Leviton. It completely solved our issue. The outlet and cover plate are very easy to install, and only took a few minutes. If you need something more flush, this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesky

customer_reviews.title: Great for behind furniture.. remember the ground wire!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed behind our dresser against the wall.. just deep enough for the TV plug , and for what it's worth - the power plug for a Fire Stick fits in the recessed part (width wise) just fine. As others have stated, it's important to connect your ground wire to the outlet when you wire it in. Do that and you should be happy. You can find these at Lowes and save a few bucks but c'mon.. Amazon delivers to your house!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Works well behind furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this receptacle behind a dresser, the cords interfered with the dresser being close to the wall. This can be a bit tricky to install because of the amount of room required, make sure you don't have a shallow box before ordering. Otherwise, installation is like any other receptacle. I've installed two so far and will continue to use them as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a great look.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to run an outlet behind my new TV wall mount so there are no cables dangling down. This was easy to mount even in a standard-depth old work box. A deeper box would be nice, but is not necessary unless perhaps if you're installing this in the middle of a circuit rather than at the end, and would need room for another romex in the box. This is easier to install than a standard outlet since there's no cover plate, it's all built into one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Truck Spank

customer_reviews.title: A sometimes necessary great idea
customer_reviews.text: Works well as most Leviton products. When kitchen clocks were electric this was called a clock outlet as you could plug in the clock and hang it flush again the wall. I now use it when space behind an appliance is tight and the plug sticks straight out. It provides the often necessary extra 1" or so of room behind the appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Lance B. Golden

customer_reviews.title: If this is what you think you need....it's a terrific buy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted - for a fraction of the Big Box price. (Not to mention the availability.) The Big Box had to order it and couldn't specify any delivery date. I had a couple counter-top appliances with the plugs pretty much sticking out of the wall and slightly in the way and not so good looking. This is perfect. It recessed the plugs and matches my other kitchen fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: draes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but understand the application and limitations
customer_reviews.text: I installed one of these in a kitched cabinet just above an existing outlet so I could put this on the bottom shelf and hide all the electronics clutter. Awsome combination.  Worth considering that this only works for standard plugs. Larger GFI type plugs and power adapters will not fit inside. ;)
customer_reviews.author: KWheel

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used it to replace outlet behind my hutch that has a plug for lights. I was able to push my hutch almost flush against the trim. It fit my standard electrical box perfectly. It was my last outlet in the run so the box only had 3 wires (1 hot, 1 neutral, & 1 ground). It may get a little cramped with double the wires but certainly doable. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not Code Compliant (not tamper resistant)
customer_reviews.text: These are not code compliant for residential receptacles since the 2012 code. The listing provided incorrect information. These receptacles need to be tamper resistant and they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I had an outlet behind the bed and was worried that the lamp plugged into it would wear and short out. This outlet made a huge difference and I feel like the bed isn't pressing so hard on the plug and if the plug works part way out of the socket a fallen pillow will not hit it and cause a fire. Easy enough to install but if you don't know how then get some experienced help. Be safe!
customer_reviews.author: FunGuy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a speaker with a wall mount location.
customer_reviews.text: I installed on a wall, positioned behind a speaker (Sonos) so I could plug it in and obscure the receptacle and power wire making for a less cluttered look. Nice product. Wish the manufacturer would make the same thing but with built-in surge protection.
customer_reviews.author: Fobie

customer_reviews.title: Great for MOST situations.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but when used with an old work deep box there were tabs in the deep box that needed to be shaved off. I’m not sure that this was the product or the box’s fault. The only other downside was I believe the socket could have been recessed about 1/8th of an inch more. A standard Vizio power cord stuck out about 1/2 inch or so. This caused the bottom of my TV to sit slightly farther from the wall than the top when using an ultra low profile wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Michael Hales

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says it is, it works in a standard box and I used it for the receptacle behind our dishwasher because with a normal receptacle the dishwasher couldn’t sit flush with the kitchen cabinets, but with this recessed receptacle the dish washer plug was recessed into the wall allowing the dishwasher to sit against the wall and flush with our kitchen cabinets! Also, this receptacle does take up about the same amount of space as a GFCI receptacle in the receptacle box.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: These worked great mounting a flat-screen tv on the wall. The recess prevents the plug head from sticking out too far. Note: The only downside is there is no way to use a 3 plug adapter with this ... you get 2 plugins. I use it one for tv and one for mounted soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: worked great for our application, we hung and electric fireplace on the wall and wanted it to plug in without the plug causing the unit to stick out awkwardly. This worked great. Anytime you want to get a flush mount install over something directly on top of an outlet, consider this to make it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy way to hide power cables
customer_reviews.text: Installs just like a regular inwall box. I wounted this behind a keyholder that has a lamp build in so the power cable wouldn't be see . Ended up looking great!
customer_reviews.author: RVel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to replace an existing receptacle, IF you have a deep box
customer_reviews.text: Check your box before you order. If you have a shallow box, that will need to be replaced with a deep box to accommodate the recessed receptacle. If you have a deep box, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Ellett

customer_reviews.title: Leviton outlets always are pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Leviton is a reliable brand. This one is a duplex outlet, which is handy for a flat screen TV and firestick with a wall-hugging mount.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M,

customer_reviews.title: Great for those tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Had outlet in back of microwave. When plugged in, the microwave hung over the shelf. Recessed outlet eliminated problem.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy swap out
customer_reviews.text: Was worried quality wouldn’t be too good. I am pleased to say that it is a good quality item and a easy install.
customer_reviews.author: April Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Exact Almand color
customer_reviews.text: Matches the rest of the house. Installs like every other outlet. Matches the color of all my other sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Wagon

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fairly thick material. Turn the power off at your breaker so you don’t get fried like me. It was electrifying! -Danny Zuko
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great outlet for my wall mounted tv
customer_reviews.text: This Recessed Duplex Receptacle works great for my wall mounted tv. Make sure you get a deep outlet box to accommodate the wiring AND the recessed outlet. I got the deeper box and I had to shave the "fins" back a little in the outlet box in order for the receptacle to fit all the way inside. I don't know if all the outlet boxes have these "fins or ridges" in the back half of the box or if I just got lucky but the one I got had them. All in all I'm happy with this receptacle and really happy to have my power cord hidden rather than dangling down the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sandorae

customer_reviews.title: Fits in standard electrical box++
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this model as it fits in a standard electrical box, not like a few others that require a deep electrical box to mount it. I have a thin wall space where the TV is mounted and a deep electric box would not fit. Product is well made and deep enough to keep plugs flush with wall when plugged in,
customer_reviews.author: Icedroid

customer_reviews.title: Does need full sun to operate fully
customer_reviews.text: I've had the solar powered fountain in my garden pond for months now and still enjoy it, as do the fish! I didn't anchor it, but allow it to float around. So, it does need full sunlight to operate on high, but that's ok, as it floats and finds places in my small-ish water feature to spout its own height, according to the sun. Glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great If You're Looking For a Black Recessed Outlet.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to blend in behind a wall-mounted neon been sign. The big box stores sell the almond color recessed outlets, however, I specifically was looking for black.
customer_reviews.author: millekj

customer_reviews.title: FOR USE IN WALL FOR HOME SECURITY SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: We have this mounted in the wall in the box we made for our home security system. I works great and does its job. WE HAVE EVERYTHING MOUNTED IN THE BOX PRETTY TIGHTLY SO WE DIDN'T WANT THE PLUGS TO BE STICKING OUT AND IN THE WAY.
customer_reviews.author: timeforachange

customer_reviews.title: Hide wall mount TV Plugs behind TV - no plugs down the wall
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for T V Wall mount so cords don't run down the wall. Perfect solution. After looking at it - I wish every plug in the house were recessed. Even if things are plugged in, you could push furniture flush to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: JD B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in a standard socket box. Only thing is it takes almost all the space in the box so you may need to cut/fold the wires in the back a bit.
customer_reviews.author: mo14pho

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Outlet behind my TV. Being recessed back this helps to make room for bulky plugs. Allowing TV to rest flat up against tv mount/wall.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made and defective
customer_reviews.text: This serves a purpose, it feels cheap and apparently is. The first time I pushed a plug into it the insides came apart leaving nothing to engage the plug. At least it did not short so the other socket was usable but still needing replacement. I don't trust it enough buy another like it. Leviton is usually a trustworthy brand, but I won't buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Power User

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounted TV must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a clean look for my wall mounted TV and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Noel V

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for standard depth box
customer_reviews.text: Solved a problem with dresser drawer bumping into plug when opening. Easy install for standard depth box.
customer_reviews.author: steve42

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but make sure your power cord isn't a 90 degree plug
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Screw hole stripped...take care when screwing this to a crowded workbox
customer_reviews.text: I love the Leviton brand, but when screwing in this particular recessed gang plate the top screw hole stripped causing the screw to pass right through and providing no security -- causing me to buy another one. I expected higher qualify from Leviton.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I needed and it fit in wall easily.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was a direct replacement for the standard outlet that was there. One thing to keep in mind is that you can't plug in a larger socket.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but quality is a little iffy
customer_reviews.text: Good concept for a product. More outlets should be this way. Works fine, but the fit and finish is a little questionable. I bought two of these. For one of them, one of the outlets was almost impossible to get a plug to fit in. I had to really force it. Also, the quality of the facade plastic seems a little crappy. If you are going to hide this behind an HDTV or something, like I did, you probably won't ever notice.
customer_reviews.author: Melanthius

customer_reviews.title: Deep plug in
customer_reviews.text: Just what you need if you put shiplap over your existing walls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was designed for. I use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was designed for. I use them to bring electricity behind my paintings so I can light them up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Denis

customer_reviews.title: not big/deep enough
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't recess enough for a straight corded grounded plug, will only fit 1 flat plug. I ended up buying a 2 gang TV outlet box which was much better.
customer_reviews.author: OzzyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to go behind a mounted TV. It works pretty well, the only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it doesn't seem to sit deep enough. Basically if you are using a standard power plug the actual "plug" part before it turns to the cord(if that makes sense) is deeper than the outlet is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for behind beds!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great behind my bed. I have an adjustable bed and when I moved it the cords would come out of the sock. Not anymore with this outlet, will be buying more soon. Makes me feel safe knowing my bed is away from an electrical outlet that can cause a possible fire.
customer_reviews.author: J Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for audio/video installs
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these for my projector as well as my electric screen. I will be buying two more for my flat screens which are wall mounted. They look great. One thing to keep in mind is that these are a bit bulkier in the rear than a standard plug. It will fit in a standard 14 cu in 1 gang box but with the wires it is a tight squeeze. If you have room in your wall, use the deeper 1 gang boxes they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Sleazy E

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Used an extra deep old work box. Obviously will only work with a straight plug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for installing behind a flat screen LED TV
customer_reviews.text: I decided to hide all wires going to and from my 55" LED super-thin TV when hanging it on the wall (with an ultra-slim mount). I can plug the TV into this outlet without worrying about the plug sticking out too much where it might hit the back of the TV. I am also running all the low-voltage data cables behind the dry wall to my A/V equipment and HT-PC. Having all the wires nicely hidden looks much cleaner and more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brant

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: These work great against a wall that has furniture in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer 8305

customer_reviews.title: The only way to go for a refrigerator or getting a piece of furniture close to the wall.
customer_reviews.text: The only way to go for a refrigerator or getting a piece of furniture close to the wall. The backset of the outlet will fill up the electrical box so you will need to clean up the wire connectors, any overly long wires and clutter in the box or you will not be able to get this in place.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep plug back so dresser could sit closer to wall
customer_reviews.author: Bruce sr

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This recessed receptacle is a must have if you want a nice flush look when installing your flat screen TV. It comes as one piece, and you can not remove the receptacle from the case to change, not that you need to. It does not have a built in surge protector either, so if you do not have a whole house surge protector, you might want one that includes the surge protection. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Saves space!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure your box is deep enough. Installed in my kitchen to save counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you want your furniture to sit flush to the wall. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AH5

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless. Flawed design.
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. Flawed design. You provide a recessed outlet, but do not provide extended screws that reach the electrical box on the wall. And these are black outlets, so I can’t just go out and buy black-coated screws that are an exact match to the outlet. Item returned
customer_reviews.author: Haslov Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a number of these recessed receptacles and just love them. I use them behind my flatscreen TV and in the kitchen behind appliances that are close to the wall. The only caution I could give you, is to make sure that you have enough clearance on your plug. The two edges closest to the screws is where they get extremely close. As long as you have standard plugs. They should work just fine. You will be very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Norc Nesdam

customer_reviews.title: Nice device.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, Only problem I had with it was when I tried to plug my TV in. The plug wouldn't go all the way in either receptacle. I pushed the TV out of the way so I could get a straight shot at plugging it in and after that I had no problem plugging it in. I could have used a regular outlet but, with this solution nothing is likely to get damaged. I would recommend this to anyone who needs power in a tight area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One piece
customer_reviews.text: FYI: The outlet and recessed plate are one piece, you cannot separate them. I was hoping to swap the socket for one with USB ports. Also no electrical box is included.
customer_reviews.author: BonesDT

customer_reviews.title: Not worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: This box doesn't work for all electrical plugs only for small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Gold

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: All outlets should be like this one. Easy to use the outlet and push furniture against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Leigha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Check colors before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check your colors closely before buying. I ordered almond color, which is what each and every other outlet cover in my house is colored, Almond in this product is almost just an off white color. Didn't match but, it installed very easily into a standard sized "blue box" and since it's hidden by the TV, didn't mind the color difference so I still have it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Worked nice behind our wall mounted TV. Real clean look and if you are wall mounting a TV you wont regret getting this! You dont have to worry about the plug in sticking out to far.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. No issue with setup or function
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have used these a lot, I install televisions. These are great to place behind the TV, especially when you want an 'ultra thin' mount to be close to the wall and you do not want a regular outlet making the plug stick the entire TV out an extra 2"-3". Leviton makes great products and I purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I am using this behind the TV in the faux brick (1/2 inch thick tile) wall. Did not need to extend the box; it had just the right depth for it.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. I am using this to recess the plug for my projector and it helps a ton to keep the ceiling tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful...!! Now that it's in the wall behind the ref. I find myself looking around the house and finding more places to put them. It was easy to install, great American English instructions. Will buy these again, and from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very limited to what can be plugged into this recessed outlet, and wasn't returnable
customer_reviews.author: GM15

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than box store
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than local box store. Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Shipped on time and delivered on time. Install was a breeze came with instructions no problems. Works great and cheaper than the hardware store same brand same quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Recessed plug in box
customer_reviews.text: I needed a recessed box behind a drawer and this fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Today's TV mounts are so low profile ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! Today's TV mounts are so low profile you can't even plug your TV into the wall without the plug hitting the back of the TV. Easy install and fits in regular size box.
customer_reviews.author: beaver

customer_reviews.title: Pairs nicely with ultra-slim TV mounts - makes sure the plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Pairs nicely with ultra-slim TV mounts - makes sure the plug doesn't get in the way of the TV laying flat against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: StLouis4514

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Our new house seemingly had a standard receptacle where the living room TV should go. This installed easily and works perfect well to help with concealing some of the cords behind a Flat Screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic recessed outlet.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and solves the problem of trying to buy a separate box and outlet, then trying to fit them together. This is my second purchase because I was very happy with the first one I bought. And of course, it provides a good recess to keep those plugs out of the way of furniture and TV mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: News Monitor

customer_reviews.title: Color name/photo mismatch
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would have rated 5 stars if not for the description saying "light almond" but photo showed ivory color. Just the opposite for the ivory version - photo is light almond. I chanced it and went with the description and the correct color did arrive, not as shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mike - Waco, TX

customer_reviews.title: The plastic is sturdy and it fit my standard-sized electrical outlet
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is sturdy and it fit my standard-sized electrical outlet. I used this so that my cords are not bent by our bed frame against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: William Tyler Strait

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used this inside of my medicine cabinet to keep everything recessed!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Adds needed backspace.
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged the flat outlet in my kitchen for this one so I could fit a good size microwave in a prefab cabinet designed for a toaster oven. Works great to add an additional 1-1.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Joliver

customer_reviews.title: As advertized
customer_reviews.text: Needed recessed outlet to flush mount ac plug for range in kitchen to gain 1/2 an inch to open cutlery drawer past oven handle. Installed with no problems
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: East to Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fits within a standard old-box unit from any of the box stores. works great mounted behind the TV within the wall mount area.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sherman

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sturdy, and pretty. Best of all it fits in a standard box. I had to trim down the copper wires a little to make an easier fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: convenience at its best
customer_reviews.text: These are a great change so that you can actually push your items up against the wall and not worry about the plugs bending or having to leave that space. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Look better then traditional outlets
customer_reviews.text: I bought a out 6 of them. No install issues. They look way better then traditional outlets and allow for appliances to be pushed all the way back to wall.
customer_reviews.author: glockgirl

customer_reviews.title: Helps me get the refrigerator against the wall.
customer_reviews.text: easy to put in. allows me to get the refrigerator right up against the wall in a small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and great value for the money. Less expensive than the box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: These work great!!  Helps keep furniture closer to walls, great space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep furniture closer to walls, great space saver. I plan to buy more! The price could be better but is about the same as my local hardware store, I just hate to drive and find parking when I can get these with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: E. Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works nice.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for ceiling mounted power to TV. Looks nice (hides part of the plug). Easy to install. Seems of sufficient quality for the application. I wasn't able to locate this at hardware stores near me (Silicon Valley, California); I'm glad Amazon offered this. Russ
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. IMO never use one of these behind a TV, the anglked recessed work much better. However, for my use behind a AV stand, worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I've used these oytlets for years and they are perfect for those certain situations. These went into the top of a black stained mantle piece so the client could set lamps right on top of them without the plug sticking up.
customer_reviews.author: brian n alderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits in a standard depth outlet box It's one piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a standard depth outlet box It's one piece contruction looks fairly study but looks cheap It's a very basic, non removable outlet with sufficient but not outstanding quality
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these things are the best. dishwasher and fridge now perfectly inline with the cabinet fronts.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find such a great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed individual parts and not the full kits being offered, this fit the ticket! Used for our remodel and TV/wall mount remodel Easy to use, great product and will use for other Family Members remodels :) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Morris

product_meta.title: Leviton 689-W, 1-Pack, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:1 PackThe Leviton recessed boxes install invisibly behind wall units, wall mounted flat panel TVs, monitors and signature artwork. They are perfect for homes, apartments, co ops, condominiums and offices. 15 Amp 1 Gang Recessed Duplex Receptacle, Residential Grade, with Screws Mounted to Housing, White.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Take advantage of soaring sales for flat screen TVs with Leviton's recessed devices. They offer flawless, flush-mounted installation that's unobtrusive behind today's TVs, monitors and entertainment centers. The recessed single-gang receptacle supplies AC power to two components, such as a flat panel TV and video receiver. The Leviton recessed boxes install invisibly behind wall units, wall-mounted flat panel TVs, monitors and signature artwork. They are perfect for homes, apartments, co-ops, condominiums and offices. 15 Amp 1-Gang Recessed Duplex Receptacle, Residential Grade, with Screws Mounted to Housing, White.
feature_bullets: Flush mounted to install invisibly behind wall units, wall mounted Flat Panel TVs and signature artwork
Offers a UL approved, code compliant solution providing two 15A/125VAC NEMA 5 15R power outlets
Supplies AC power for two components (flat panel TVs and video receiver)
Perfect in homes, apartments, co ops, condominiums and offices
